Type Definitions.html#/c:NXNetwork.h@T@N.name: NXNetworkReachabilityStatusChangedHandler
Type Definitions.html#/c:NXNetwork.h@T@N.abstract: A block used to handle changes in a network object’s reachabiltiy status

Protocols/NXNetworkDelegate.html#/c:objc.name: -network:reachabilityStatusChanged:
Protocols/NXNetworkDelegate.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sent to the delegate when the network object’s reachability status changes

Protocols/NXNetworkDelegate.html.name: NXNetworkDelegate
Protocols/NXNetworkDelegate.html.abstract: The methods of NXNetworkNavigationDelegate protocol help you observe and handle changes to a NXNetwork object’s reachability.

Enums/NXNetworkReachabilityStatus.html#/.name: NXNetworkReachabilityStatusReachableOverWiFi
Enums/NXNetworkReachabilityStatus.html#/.abstract: The network object is reachable over WiFi

Enums/NXNetworkReachabilityStatus.html#/.name: NXNetworkReachabilityStatusReachableOverWWAN
Enums/NXNetworkReachabilityStatus.html#/.abstract: The network object is reachable over WWAN

Enums/NXNetworkReachabilityStatus.html.name: NXNetworkReachabilityStatus
Enums/NXNetworkReachabilityStatus.html.abstract: An enumeration describing the various reachability statuses (statii?)

Constants.html#/c:@NXNetworkReachability.name: NXNetworkReachabilityStatusChanged
Constants.html#/c:@NXNetworkReachability.abstract: Notification sent when an NXNetwork’s reachability status changes

Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.name: +sharedNetwork
Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.abstract: The generic shared network object. You can use this singleton if you don’t want to manage ownership of the network object directly, and you can interact with and observe changes to its reachabilty status via notifications, blocks, its delegate object.

Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.name: +network
Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.abstract: Create a generic network object, observing changes to internet reachability

Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.name: -initWithHostName:
Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.abstract: Create network object that observes changes to the reachability of a single hostname and only that hostname

Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.name: -initWithHostAddress:
Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.abstract: Create network object that observes changes to the reachability of a single IP address and only that IP address

Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.name: delegate
Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.abstract: The delegate object to be informed of changes to the network object’s reachability status

Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.name: reachabilityStatusChangedHandler
Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.abstract: The block to be executed when the network object’s reachability status changes

Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.name: listening
Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.abstract: The ‘listening’ status of the network object. If the network objet is listening for changes, notifications will be sent, blocks will be executed, and the delegate object will be informed when the network object’s reachability status changes.

Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.name: reachabilityStatus
Classes/NXNetwork.html#/c:objc(cs)NXNetw.abstract: The current reachability status of the network object

Classes/NXNetwork.html.name: NXNetwork
Classes/NXNetwork.html.abstract: NXNetwork is a long-use object used to listen to and handle changes in a device’s network reachability. You should create an instance of a NXNetwork object and retain a strong reference to it in memory, and react to changes using by observing the NXNetworkReachabilityStatusChanged notification, a block you can assign to nexum instance’s reachabilityStatusChangedHandler property, or an object that conforms to NXNetworkDelegate protocol.

Type Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
